entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please state the reason for your call.
Hi, I'm calling about an order I recently received. The bike I ordered arrived damaged.
Hello! I'm so sorry to hear that your VeloFit bike arrived damaged. Can you please provide your order number so I can pull up your account?
Thank you. I see your order here. Can you describe the damage to the bike?
Well, the box looked like it had taken a beating and when I opened it, I saw the frame was cracked, and honestly the front wheel seems wobbly. It looks like it sustained some serious shipping damage.

Oh dear, that sounds terrible! I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. A cracked frame and a wobbly wheel due to shipping damage is completely unacceptable. We want you to have a perfect VeloFit experience.
Yeah, I was really looking forward to using it.
I understand your frustration. To rectify this, I'd like to offer you a full refund for the bike. Would that be agreeable to you?
A full refund? Yes, that would be great.

Excellent. I've already processed the refund, and you should see it reflected in your account within 5-7 business days. We’ll also provide you with a free label to return the damaged bike. I’ll email that to you right away.
A free label? That's fantastic. Thank you so much!

You're very welcome! I just sent the email with the free label. Simply repackage the bike in its original box, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you for your help and for resolving this so quickly.
My pleasure! We appreciate your understanding. Thank you for choosing VeloFit and have a wonderful day!
